calculateADLScore(address,uint256,uint25.details: Score = PnL% * Leverage. Higher = more likely to be ADL'd This prioritizes high-leverage, high-profit positions

getADLCandidates(uint256,bool,address[],.details: This is gas-intensive, meant for off-chain use

params.side: true = get longs, false = get shorts

params.badDebtAmount: Amount of bad debt to cover
params.candidates: Array of traders on opposing side sorted by ADL score (desc)
params.liquidatedSide: true = long was liquidated, false = short was liquidated

calculateADLScore(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Calculate ADL score for a position

getADLCandidates(uint256,bool,address[],.notice: Get ADL candidates for a market (sorted by score)

processBadDebt(uint256,uint256,bool,addr.notice: Process bad debt through insurance + ADL

wouldTriggerADL(uint256).notice: Check if ADL would be triggered for a given bad debt amount
